text: Need Brandon Nelson for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $1,914, looking for 2 x Radio interview, 3 x Instagram post, 1 x Media interview, 3 x Press conference, 1 x LinkedIn post. 11 week exclus from other electronics brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
